title: Mobile Microlearning for Student-Led Investment Program Operations

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Program enhancing investment analysis capabilities by establishing smartphone-based experiential learning environments for professionals

learning_goals: Students can construct virtual portfolios and establish risk management strategies using mobile platforms.
Students can design decision-making processes by applying ethical investment principles and practical case studies.
Students enhance their ability to analyze financial market volatility and write reports through team-based investment simulations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
